page.title: 05New Estate in Chelmsford (2)
page.content: The{shopping facilities}are generally{not very good}although there is a large supermarket.Many people,especially the{elderly}at Newlands Spring would like to have a {post office}nearby.This is probably so that they would be able to get their pensions more easily.Some of them felt that a small food store would save them queueing up in the supermarket for just a couple of items.{A fish and {chip shop would also be popular with {all age groups.}Generally, our group thinks that Newlands Spring estate is good but it does not have very many facilities to offer the older generation. This may be because the {estate}was probably{built for young {families with children.
